globalSettings.title: Global Settings
globalSettings.description: Configure global settings for the WireGuard interface and generated peer configs. Changes will automatically sync to all client configurations.
globalSettings.noPermission: You do not have permission to access server configuration. Admin access is required.

serverConfig.addressHint: Server tunnel IP address in CIDR format
serverConfig.publicKeyHint: Server public key (calculated from private key, read-only)
serverConfig.postUpHint: Commands to run after the interface is brought up (optional)
serverConfig.postDownHint: Commands to run before the interface is brought down (optional)
serverConfig.serverIPHint: Server public IP address for client endpoint (optional, auto-detected if empty)
serverConfig.dnsHint: DNS server for client configs (optional, comma-separated IP addresses, e.g., 1.1.1.1, 8.8.8.8)

messages.updateSuccess: Server configuration updated successfully. All client configurations will be automatically synchronized.
